General.Name: Northfield Capital Corporation
General.Description: Northfield Capital Corporation is a principal investment firm. The firm prefers to invest in companies operating in the glass, manufacturing, oil and gas, mining, and technology industries. Northfield Capital Corporation was formed and incorporated in 1981 under the name Puissance Resources Limited. It changed its name to Puissance Corporation in 1983 and to Northfield Capital Corporation in 1987. Northfield Capital is based in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 141 Adelaide Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 3L5
